name: IronDot Trio Black
description:
IronDot Trio provides a very unique opportunity to challenge and prove yourself very similar to IronMan triathlon but in a mental and gaming way!

It features 3 very tough games as 3 continuous stages but all with great fun: Courage, Focus and Perseverance!

You have to collect 30 totems in each stage all within limited time: 120 seconds for the first stage, 180 for the second and 120 for the third. You will automatically move to the next stage without any hiatus if you are successful in the previous one. You have to conquer the three stages all at once to be a finisher of IronDot Trio. If you fail at any point of any stage, you have to start all of over again. So, any finisher of IronDot Trio indeed earns life-long bragging rights!

IronDot Trio Black features a BLACK dot as opposed to a WHITE one which is in the IronDot Trio version (available at the website) with totally different game plays but similarly tough or almost impossible mental and gaming challenges!

Come and challenge yourself now at our eSports platform to see how good you are mentally and gaming-wise!
